instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-4924 SSD not recognized
threads.message:
G'day folks,

Got a 2015 13" Retina here that doesn't recognize SSD's. Visually there is nothing wrong with the board that would point to a cause for this issue. Tested several SSD's all have the same issue. Techtool pro DOES show the SSD under SMART check but can't run the test. AHT shows the battery needs service but doesn't mention an SSD issue. Option-boot shows a recovery partition but won't boot from it (SSD does get warm so is getting power). macOS, Disk Utility and System Information show the controller but no info on the SSD.

I don't know where to even begin looking for a board issue on this one, any pointers much appreciated :)

threads.title: 820-4924 SSD not recognized
threads.message: Post voltages for pin 1,7,8,24, and 47 for J3700. You can measure without the SSD plugged in for these.

threads.title: 820-4924 SSD not recognized
threads.message:
Pin1: 3.3V
Pin7: 3.3V
Pin8: 3.4V
Pin24: 3.3V
Pin47: 3.3V
Measured without SSD

threads.title: 820-4924 SSD not recognized
threads.message: Ewww this one will somewhat suck then. Does it boot externally?

threads.title: 820-4924 SSD not recognized
threads.message:
Insert SSD and check again pins 7 & 24.
Also check pin 8/U3740.
